message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good deal!
Your turn Alice.  I'm feeling generous, but let's not waste any more time with unfair offers.
Come on, Bob, 58-42 is as fair as it gets!
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. Meet me in the middle or this money will disappear before our eyes!
I'm willing to compromise, 56-44 is a good middle ground!
Alice, this is ridiculous! We're losing money fast! Take this offer and let's be done with it!
